title: @Porocles Stuck @ Calculating Differences
body:
Hello!

I was able to play League this morning, but after an hour or so it's stuff at 33% "Calculating Differences". Was there an update pushed out within the past few hours? I also received an error message telling me to check my logs, this is a first for me....

replies.body:
It looks like there's a sudden burst of threads on this, so I'll see if there's anything going on.  At this part of the patching process, your network is trying to establish comms with the patching servers to download files.  In the meantime, help me out and go through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide just in case there may be anything going on locally.  Let me know if that helps!

Update:  It looks like a new patch rolled out!  Unless you are receiving an error, let the patcher do its thing.  It should finish updating in no time!  If you do receive an error, the connection guide should help for your specific issue.

I've gone through the guide and there is nothing.  Here is the error from the patcher log if that will help.

000001.881|   OKAY| Riot::RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile: ("/releases/live/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/releaselisting_NA", "C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/temp/TMP2.tmp", 0x0651EDB0)
000029.159|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Common/HTTPConnection.cpp(842): File not found, HTTP response code 504, while retrieving file:'/releases/live/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/releaselisting_NA'.
000029.160|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::RetrieveReleaseListing: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Networking/ClientServer/RemoteFileServerCommon.cpp(46): Failed to download listing file from "/releases/live/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/releaselisting_NA" to temp file "C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/temp/TMP2.tmp"
000029.160|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::RemoteFileServerHTTP::EnumerateAvailableReleasesForRegion: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Networking/ClientServer/RemoteFileServerHTTP.cpp(118): Error retrieving release listing
000029.160|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::UpdateAndInstallSolutionShared::ChooseSolutionVersion: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Install/UpdateAndInstallSolutionShared.cpp(268): Failed to enumerate available releases.
000029.160|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::UpdateSolution: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Install/UpdateSolution.cpp(607): Failed to choose a target version
000029.160|  ERROR| Riot::LoLLauncherLib::`anonymous-namespace'::InstallLatestSolutionRelease: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/LoLPatcherLib/UpdateWorker.cpp(208): Failure or interruption while updating
000029.160|   OKAY| Riot::LoLLauncherLib::AddProjectUpdateMetrics: project_update_metrics_internal_message_identifier : game - Update Time 27.3 sec, Downloaded 0 Bytes, Avg 0 BytesPerSec. Result: failure.
000029.160|  ERROR| Riot::LoLLauncherLib::UpdateWorker::DoUpdateGame: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/LoLPatcherLib/UpdateWorker.cpp(451): Failed to install latest game client.
000029.161| ALWAYS| Riot::LoLLauncherLib::UpdateWorker::Run: Patching lasted for 27.5 seconds. Result: failure.
Looks like the patching server is returning a 504 to the client.
Suddenly it let me in with no patch at all.  Seems to be working now.
It's very sporadic and random. Sometimes it lets me in, other times I have to change regions or run the repair tool. Its bizarre.
Yeah, nothing in the connection issues guide works. It's still stuck at 33%.. this is the first time since 2009 that I've had an update issue.

> [{quoted}](name=SuperGeon,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ETE1iqTG,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2016-10-08T18:54:01.138+0000)
>
> Yeah, nothing in the connection issues guide works. It's still stuck at 33%.. this is the first time since 2009 that I've had an update issue.

Thanks for trying!  The issue seems to be more widespread, and I'm looking to get more information on it right now.  In the meantime, some players have been able to get through just by continuing to select retry.  Give it a go, and you may be able to get through to the patching server.  Thanks for hanging in there and trying all that out!
Porocles, why couldn't this have happened on a Monday ;'-(
I am also receiving the same error.
Same issue here, along with a few of my friends.
I am having this issue also.
So, I can press "Launch" now, but it says that my password and login are incorrect. WTF
